title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be carrying a game of one-upmanship with a colleague or neighbor too far now. Of course, theres nothing wrong with a little friendly competition, but the volatile Sun-Pluto square could steer you into a rivalry that wears you down. Stop the contest long enough to evaluate whether your need to win is more about feeling superior rather than improving yourself. Using another persons success or failure as a yardstick for your own could put you at a greater disadvantage than trusting your perceptions. Theodore Roosevelt said, Comparison is the thief of joy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
